shortDescription: You'll find my brother waiting for you at the Red Roost. It looks like a commercial office park, but don't be fooled. The structure is reinforced to withstand military payloads. Engage my brother's security team and raze the Red Roost. Let his stronghold serve as his tomb!
longDescription: We're taking a gamble on this one, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. But given our options, it's one that I can live with.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Lord Angus Khulan's Stronghold
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy Enemy Structures and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Red Roost
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Lord Angus Khulan's Bodyguards
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Bodyguard Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to eliminate enemy reinforcements who attack.

objectiveList.title: Proceed to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to extract their units.

dialogueContent.words: Looks like we're in the right place, Commander. Lord Angus Khulan is hailing us.
Attention, incoming BattleMechs! You are trespassing on… wait. You're the brutes that Mother sent to kill Sister. Is Yvonne dead? Can I see the body?
I'm sorry to disappoint you, Brother. But I am not the Khulan who will die today.

You've sent them here, to the Red Roost? My poor, deluded sister. My bodyguards will crush them, and I will drink in the spectacle like a fine port wine. And then, when I tell Mother what you've done, she will—

Send more assassins? Threaten to disinherit me, and then rage against the laws that prevent her from doing so? There's nothing more that either of you can threaten me with, Brother. And now, your time has come.

I thank you again, Commander. My brother was a tick on House Khulan's back, draining our coffers and preying on our mother's diminished faculties. Now he is dead, his poisonous influence cut short, and I have you to thank.
You can thank us by lending Shugo Yamaguchi your support, like you promised you would.

I haven't forgotten our arrangement, Mr. Oliveira. I am indebted to your company, and as a fellow mercenary, I fully understand the importance of managing my debts. When you speak with Shugo Yamaguchi, I will reaffirm my commitment to supporting him.
We can't compete with what Lord Angus is fielding, Boss. Yuetu's gonna have to find someone else to bury her brother, 'cause our job here is done.
Brace yourself, Commander. We've got more Khulan bodyguards entering the AO.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

It is done. My brother is dead, entombed in the rubble of his own sanctuary. When I inherit the governorship, I think I'll enshrine it in bronze and marble. A memorial to the follies of ambitious men.
Nice shot, Commander! That's all of House Khulan's bodyguards down.
